mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.title AS "title", a.smal_image AS "smalImage", a.image AS "image", a.keywords AS "keywords", a.tags AS "tags", a.description AS "description", a.content AS "content", a.content_html AS "contentHtml", a.recommend AS "recommend", a.order_no AS "orderNo", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cms_product( id, title, smal_image, image, keywords, tags, description, content, content_html, recommend, order_no, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{title}, #{smalImage}, #{image}, #{keywords}, #{tags}, #{description}, #{content}, #{contentHtml}, #{recommend}, #{orderNo}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE cms_product SET title = #{title}, smal_image = #{smalImage}, image = #{image}, keywords = #{keywords}, tags = #{tags}, description = #{description}, content = #{content}, content_html = #{contentHtml}, recommend = #{recommend}, order_no = #{orderNo}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
